extendedInfo.description: This high-definition slot machine game has been built from the ground up to appeal to all the real slot machine lovers out there.  Magic Love is a classic slot-machine game and this new high resolution game will let you compete against your friends to see who can have the highest score.  You can then, using your luck, post your high score to Facebook and claim bragging rights as the Magic Love champion.The main slot machine game will keep you entertained watching the high resolution tiles spin past, and there is also an added bonus game that you can earn many more times what you have won. As well, if youâre a fan of roulette, you will love the idea of doubling your credits.  There is an interactive Valentine's day themed double game that you can play  over and over again to get new high scores.This game is exclusive to Android phones and Android tablets, it is completely free to use, and the developers will never charge any money or request donations.Some of the key features of Magic Love Slot Machine HD are as follows:- Magic Love theme, ideal Valentine's day games- 5 different reels of high resolution tiles- There are 9 lines that can all pay out in the main slot machine game- Support for Android 2.3 and up- HD graphics for great 'stretching' on a tabletYou will enjoy playing this fun slot machine game, and be sure to share it with your friends!  You don't have to wait until Valentine's day to share the love! Any comments or questions about our Magic Love casino slot machines app? Please email us at feedback@CasinoApps1234.com and if you want to know more about Magic Love Slot Machine, visit the official website atÂ http://MagicLoveSlotMachine.com or see any of these helpful sites below:Magic Love Slot Machines Google+ Page:https://plus.google.com/107418207224490024534Magic Love Slot Machines Facebook Community:http://www.facebook.com/MagicLoveSlotMachinesMagic Love Slot Machines Facebook App Center:http://www.facebook.com/appcenter/magicloveslotmachineFollow Magic Love Slot Machines on Twitter:https://www.twitter.com/MagicLoveSlots
